ch0158_40_carnet/0101_0701_02_10:
Hehe! I’m just practicing for a role! Let’s have a
great day again today, shall we?
ch0158_40_carnet/7101_0701_01_10:
I once played the part of a knight back in Kalos
and used several different Pokémon as a
reference for the role.
ch0158_40_carnet/7101_0701_02_10:
For example, Gallade, Aegislash, and Escavalier,
just to name a few.
ch0158_40_carnet/7101_0701_03_10:
It was a great experience for me, and it even
helped increase my Pokémon knowledge.
ch0158_40_carnet/7102_0701_01_10:
Did you know? Legend has it that Keldeo has three
Pokémon mentors that trained it.
ch0158_40_carnet/7102_0701_02_10:
I sure would love to see how Pokémon teach each
other to battle.
ch0158_40_carnet/7103_0701_01_10: This outfit looks heavy, you say?
ch0158_40_carnet/7103_0701_02_10:
Hehehe. I may not look it, but I’m actually quite
strong, you know!
ch0158_40_carnet/7103_0701_03_10:
Looks alone aren’t enough to make me a good
actress. I have to be physically fit as well!
ch0158_40_carnet/7104_0701_01_10: Keldeo loves beautiful areas near water.
ch0158_40_carnet/7104_0701_02_10:
Here on Pasio, it really likes playing near the
fountain in town. It’s a beautiful area with a great
atmosphere, after all.
ch0158_40_carnet/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have anything that you want to
protect, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0158_40_carnet/7105_0701_02_10:
Those with something to protect must train hard to
prepare themselves for when that time comes.
ch0158_40_carnet/7105_0701_03_10:
And not just physical strength but mental strength
as well. It’s hard to fight without a solid mind to
back up your body.
ch0158_40_carnet/1701_0701_01_10: I bequeath this gift unto you.
ch0158_40_carnet/1701_0701_02_10:
May it protect you in my stead—even when I am
far away.
ch0158_40_carnet/1701_0702_01_10:
Thank you for helping me practice my
acting earlier!
ch0158_40_carnet/1701_0702_02_10:
As a thank-you, you can keep the item I gave you
during practice as a gift. I hope you can put it to
good use!
ch0158_40_carnet/2501_0701_01_10:
When Keldeo and Gardevoir first met, they both
froze in place as if cautiously observing
each other.
ch0158_40_carnet/2501_0701_02_10:
It seems like they’ve learned to relax a bit now
that they’ve been together for a while, but...
ch0158_40_carnet/2501_0701_03_10:
They were both studying each other so intently at
the time. I wonder what they were thinking.
ch0158_40_carnet/2501_0702_01_10:
They’re both a bit finicky at times, but these days
I even catch them taking naps together sometimes.
ch0158_40_carnet/2501_0702_02_10:
I can’t help but smile when I see them so
relaxed together.
ch0158_40_carnet/2511_0701_01_10:
My Keldeo has a noble heart and is very strict
with itself.
ch0158_40_carnet/2511_0701_02_10:
Keldeo is currently serving as my inspiration when
I rehearse and battle. It’s a great way for me to
get fired up!
ch0158_40_carnet/2511_0702_01_10:
I often hear that Pokémon tend to take on a bit of
their Trainer’s personality...
ch0158_40_carnet/2511_0702_02_10: but I suppose the opposite is possible, too, right?
ch0158_40_carnet/3001_0701_01_10:
And so the young Trainers set off on their journey
with the sunrise behind them...and a grand
adventure ahead! *giggle*
ch0158_40_carnet/3003_0701_01_10:
With all of the training and acting I do, I have to
be careful not to overbook my schedule. Getting in
a good lunch break is key!
ch0158_40_carnet/3005_0701_01_10:
The wind can get pretty chilly at night. If you’re
going out, make sure you dress warmly! Wouldn’t
want you to catch a cold!
